name: Paper Province ekonomisk förening
goal: A business cluster association with the goal to strengthen the forestbased bio economy sector in Sweden, escpecially in the region of Värmland , Dalsland and Örebro counties. Currently 100 member companies. Focus on innovation and development, competence provision issues and internationalization. Works with project funded from Swedish agencies as well as EU. Within the innovation area we focus for example on creating value from industrial sidestreams, service innovation, commerzialisation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Bioeconomy strategy, Forest strategy, Circular economy strategy, EU policy on research, science and innovation
